metadata.title: RA Family: Example of Composite USB PHID/PMSC Project for FSP 3.6.0

sections.content: The below attached project for FSP 3.6.0 and the EK-RA2A1 kit demonstrates the use of a composite USB HID/MSC project.
It uses a PMSC RAM disc with some default settings (so it isn't optimized) but it enumerates on a Windows PC fine, so it does work with these settings.
The descriptors for the device is given in the r_usb_phid_pmsc_desc riptor.c file in the src folder. This makes it easy to modify as needed for a specific application.

Suitable Products
RA and FSP
  Source: https://renesasrulz.com/mcu-mpu-products/ra/f/forum/19481/composite-hid-msc-device-won-t-open/64256#64256

Suitable Products
RA and FSP
